well-traveled.name: Well-Traveled
well-traveled.description: Safely return from Dam Battlegrounds, Buried City and Spaceport.

rite-of-passage.name: Rite of Passage
rite-of-passage.description: Safely return to Speranza for the first time.

into-thin-air.name: Into Thin Air
into-thin-air.description: Safely return to Speranza through a Raider Hatch.

behind-closed-doors.name: Behind Closed Doors
behind-closed-doors.description: Visit a locked room on Dam Battlegrounds, Buried City or Spaceport.

the-big-haul.name: The Big Haul
the-big-haul.description: Return to Speranza with 50 000 worth of loot.

the-long-haul.name: The Long Haul
the-long-haul.description: Reach a total lifetime loot value of 1 000 000.

expert-weaponsmith.name: Expert Weaponsmith
expert-weaponsmith.description: Upgrade a weapon to Tier IV.

well-armed.name: Well-Armed
well-armed.description: Have two weapons of Tier II or higher equipped in a round.

dedicated-to-the-craft.name: Dedicated to the Craft
dedicated-to-the-craft.description: Have five stations upgraded to level 3 or higher.

self-sufficient.name: Self-Sufficient
self-sufficient.description: Install a station in your Workshop.

getting-serious.name: Getting Serious
getting-serious.description: Upgrade a Workshop station to level 2.

same-song-same-verse.name: Same Song, Same Verse
same-song-same-verse.description: Set off two car alarms in a single round.

in-the-nick-of-time.name: In the Nick of Time
in-the-nick-of-time.description: Safely return to Speranza with less than 5 seconds left in the round.

not-over-till-its-over.name: Not Over Till It's Over
not-over-till-its-over.description: Safely return to Speranza while downed.

bells-and-whistles.name: Bells and Whistles
bells-and-whistles.description: Have 4 weapon mods on a single weapon.

long-shot.name: Long Shot
long-shot.description: Hit a target over 250 meters away.

no-going-back.name: No Going Back
no-going-back.description: Be topside when the safe window closes.

just-dropping-in.name: Just Dropping In
just-dropping-in.description: Get hit by a Supply Drop.

see-you-never.name: See You Never
see-you-never.description: Return safely to Speranza while leaving a squadmate behind.

today-you-tomorrow-me.name: Today You, Tomorrow Me
today-you-tomorrow-me.description: Revive an encountered Raider with a Defibrillator.

top-of-the-world.name: Top of the World
top-of-the-world.description: Reach the top of the Launch Towers in Spaceport.

for-science.name: For Science!
for-science.description: Get gas, stun, and burn statuses at the same time.

death-from-above.name: Death From Above
death-from-above.description: Deal 50 damage to any enemy while atop a Rocketeer.

three-birds-one-stone.name: Three Birds, One Stone
three-birds-one-stone.description: Destroy 3 ARC enemies with a single Wolfpack grenade.

blindsided.name: Blindsided
blindsided.description: Destroy a Sentinel with a Raider Tool.

snitches-get-stitches.name: Snitches get Stitches
snitches-get-stitches.description: Destroy a Snitch with a Stitcher.

comparative-study.name: Comparative Study
comparative-study.description: Use 4 different weapons to deal damage in the Practice Range.

hook-line-and-sinker.name: Hook, Line, and Sinker
hook-line-and-sinker.description: Use a Lure Grenade to make a drone attack another drone.

mechanical-failure.name: Mechanical Failure
mechanical-failure.description: Shoot a thruster off a Wasp.

a-vendetta-is-born.name: A Vendetta Is Born
a-vendetta-is-born.description: Get downed and knocked out while inside a return point.

horseshoes-and-hand-grenades.name: Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
horseshoes-and-hand-grenades.description: Down an encountered Raider with a grenade.

up-close-and-personal.name: Up Close and Personal
up-close-and-personal.description: Knock out a Raider with a Raider Tool.

the-friends-we-made-along-the-way.name: The Friends We Made Along The Way
the-friends-we-made-along-the-way.description: Return to Speranza together with an encountered Raider.

enemy-of-my-enemy.name: Enemy of My Enemy
enemy-of-my-enemy.description: Get an encountered Raider downed by ARC enemies summoned with a Snitch Scanner.

heart-of-gold.name: Heart of Gold
heart-of-gold.description: Be thanked 10 times in direct response to something you did.
